title: Lol ingame client error
body:
I had one thousand MS and when the enemy team destroyed my Nexus it didn't show up with the "Defeat" title or the button "Continue" so I couldn't exit the game. Can I get banned or have a punishedment if I leave through the options tab (Esc button). I really don't want to get a ban or anything.
Thanks for reading this.

replies.body: Technically the game is finished so leaving shouldn't really do anything bad.
